summary: A Thalmor-friendly retexture of the Light Elven Armour by NewerMind43
descriptionHtml:
Thalmor Light Elven Armour by EpikurAi
------------------------------------------------------
Original Mod by NewerMind43
Bodytype - UNP
Requirements: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34074/?


First of all I have to admit that I am very noobish and the textures are all adjusted by hand. For that reason they´re full of flaws... But I uploaded them by request.


Description:
----------------
Okay, this is my very first Skyrim mod and I hope that everything works fine :-) !

Somehow I always liked those haughty, self-righteous Thalmor guys and for that reason I worked on these textures. So this mod is very lore-friendly because I only used the original Thalmor textures by Bethesda and adapted them to the armour. Pretty simple ^^.

The mod only contains new textures for NewerMind43´s Light Elven Armour.
For that reason you have to download the original mod first!!

Link: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34074/?

The armour is craftable at any forge ^^ (or use the console ;-) )


Recommended mods:
-----------------------------
- The original meshes are... uhm... pretty breezily between the legs. Perhaps you should search for some underwear mods ;-)

- Ethereal Elven Overhaul by nuska
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?

-Alternate Start - Live Another Life by Arthmoor
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?
(You can start your game as Thalmor agent if you play the High Elf race)


Credits:
----------
NewerMind43 for the original mod
Bethesda for the textures and Skyrim of course :-)
To those people who encouraged me to share those textures with the community ^^
author: EpiKurai
